# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Cale_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Cale)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
CalePluginInfo.C
CaleCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
CalePluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
CaleMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtCaleFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
CaleEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtCaleFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${PDB_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${PDB_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ICaleDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ICaleDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ICaleDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MCaleDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MCaleDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${PDB_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MCaleDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MCaleDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ECaleDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ECaleDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${PDB_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ECaleDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ECaleDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ECaleDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ECaleDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${PDB_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ECaleDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ECaleDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Cale ${INSTALLTARGETS})
